column1: NOTE: The following items are only in case leaving early is impossible.
Protective clothing (long-sleeved cotton shirts, hats, jeans, boots) for all family members
Plenty of water - Tammy, instead of saying 'plenty' is there a formula like 2 litres per person?
Cotton mops and metal buckets placed strategically around the house
Cannot rely on mains water. Have a backup tank of at least 10,000 litres in case the mains water goes down.
If using a pump, do not rely on mains power.
Items for pets including food, restraints, medications, etc
